alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:01PM CDT until May 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Northwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/. * At 700 PM CDT/600 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arthur, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sand Beach Lake, Lena, Three Mile Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Bucktail, East Cody Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 127 and 130. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 184. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
